Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-43552 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.28.2-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-43552 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.28.2-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package cmake is earlier than 3.28.2-1, affected by CVE-2022-43552
